body: LEAD: France Question: Please suggest sources of information for accommodations in France equivalent to the paradors in Spain. I would also appreciate knowing where I could find a list of farmhouses and bed and breakfast lodgings. - S. E., Bellevue, Wash. Answer: France does not have a chain of government-owned inns like the 80 or so paradors,
title: Q and A

body: LEAD: Two major titles were decided here Saturday night in the American Contract Bridge League's Fall Nationals. The Life Master Men's Pairs went to Robert Levin of Chicago, who in 1981 became the youngest-ever world champion when he won at age 24, and Larry Cohen of Culver City, Calif. They scored 808 match points. Two major titles were decided
title: Bridge

body: LEAD: An elderly couple were fatally stabbed yesterday in their Brooklyn apartment, the police said. The couple's son was arrested in the slayings. The victims, Michael Gaurilou, 81 years old, and his wife, Theresa, 78, were stabbed about 4:30 P.M. in an apartment at 765 Ninth Street in the Kensington section.
